data.title: Complete Poems New edition - Salvatore Quasimodo, Jack Bevan, Jack Bevan - 9781784105266 - Book
data.meta_description: Complete Poems New edition - Salvatore Quasimodo, Jack Bevan, Jack Bevan - ISBN: 9781784105266. Jack Bevans remarkable translation of Quasimodos entire poetic oeuvre (Anvil, 1983), redesigned and reissued in 2017 Jack Bevans remarkable translation of Quasimodos entire poetic oeuvre (Anvil, 1983), redesigned and reissued in 2017. Salvatore Quasimodo (19011968) was awarded the Nobel Prize in ...
data.text: And Your Dress Is White Sorrow of Things I Do Not Know There Was a Sound of Airy Seasons Passing No Night So Clear Ever Vanquished You You Call on a Life Even My Company Forsakes Me Every Form Waylost in Me In the Ancient Light of the Tides Young Woman Lying Back in the Midst of the Flowers One Buried in Me Declares Lament of a Friar in an Icon Came Down to Me Through New Innocence Give Me My Day Amen for Sunday in Albis On the Hill of the "Terre Bianche" In Your Light I Am Wrecked In the Right Human Time In the Feeling of Death Of the Sinner of Myths The Magpie Laughs Black in the Orange Trees What Is It, Shepherd of Air? Before the Statue of Ilaria del Carreto The Rain Is Already With Us On the Banks of the Lambro The Meagre Flower Is Already Flying Written, Perhaps, on a Tomb Again I Hear the Sea Man of My Time Beyond the Waves of the Hills Near a Saracen Tower, for My Dead Brother When the Walls and Trees Tell Down To the Fifteen of Piazzale Loreto To the Cervi Brothers, to Their Italy From the Web of Gold Today, the Twenty-First of March The Tombs of the Scaligers An Act or a Name of the Spirit At Night on the Acropolis To the New Moon Inscription for the Fallen of Marzabotto Inscription for the Partisans of Valenza Only If Love Should Pierce You From the Shores of the Balaton The Silence Does Not Deceive Me I Have Lost Nothing Enough One Day to Balance the World I Have Flowers and at Night Call on the Poplars
